channel.title: Random tads of information you *may* find useful
channel.description:
Just a quick topic detailing some information, feel free to add if anything if required. The VPS specs are the following: 2GB RAM, 30GB SSD, 1TB of data transfer/mo, and a 100mbit up/down connection. Those are the specifications the server must preferably be comfortable with for the next 4 months until it's time for renewal. It'll be running Ubuntu 12.04 (32 bit, obviously) and it'll be the most locked down thing you've ever seen. The only interface for everyone but myself shall be through Jenkins and potentially some other little cron jobs ill setup. Stuff that's on the more sketchy side of things, that might risk a DMCA should preferably be hosted externally, but this isn't an immediate threat for the testing phases.
As far as staff goes, if global moderators are interested in moderator positions they're welcome to them. The same applies to admins and an admin position. Key developers will have a rank which enables changes to be made easily, such as coords, teleport etc and possibly another testing world when we're out of testing phases so we only push stable updates to the main server. The server will be tested continuously, meaning no pre-arranged time periods for how long the server will be online, it just stays up and we work from there.
Any disagreements/concerns/questions? :)

item.title: Random tads of information you *may* find useful
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Current? No. I’m not comfortable pushing the most recent changes until I finish some of the multiplayer aspects. Soon, however.

github.com/Hadyn/mopar
